root: ^I´m Max, your Teamlead. Congratulations on being hired by the top prosthetic production company. (turns to the office)Everyone! Welcome our newest team member, Grygoriy, he is a war veteran, so I don’t think I need to say anything about the respect here.
^He will be our new system administrator, let’s all welcome him with enthusiasm and show him what good teamwork is.
^Oh, thanks, it´s a pleasure to be here.
^“They really are keen on making a good first impression” Maybe next time.
^Okay then, let me show you your workplace and explain the details.
